title: I Finally Got Healthy & #CleanEating Had F All To Do With It
author: Rose Stokes
description: A major health overhaul gave one woman an insight into the 'clean eating' world. One she didn't like at all.
cleaned_text: Having spent my life desiring change but never feeling empowered enough to implement it, I was perfect prey for the diet industry. With each new attempt, I bought into a new nutritional theory that promised to solve all my problems. I bought the books, I bought the NutriBullet, I bought the spiraliser and the coconut oil. I bought the matcha powder, I ate the kale, the avocados and the agave syrup. I did the cleanses. I ate nothing but whole foods and I cut out carbs. And do you know what happened? I didn't lose weight. For anyone looking for a quick fix or a food group to cut out to finally 'crack' your health and wellbeing, I'm sorry to tell you that there isn't one. There isn't a sexy set of instructions that guarantees results. The key is balance. [available now](https://www.amazon.co.uk/Orthorexia-When-Healthy-Eating-Goes/dp/184899334X).
